headline: The thing is symbolic of our childhood…
standfirst: “The thing is symbolic of our childhood,” they shared. ”Our dad used to buy them for us when we were little. My mum had broken her arm and gone in the ambulance with our passports, so we were illegal in Germany for a few days and our dad didn’t know what to do, so he bought us these and we made monsters out of them.”
